title: Dual-channel fluorescent sensor for rapid Cu<sup>2+</sup> and Fe<sup>3+</sup> detection: Enhanced sensitivity and selectivity with triazole-substituted acridinedione derivative
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Srinivasan Parthiban Ragavi, Dhakshanamurthy Thirumalai, Indira Viswambaran Asharani, Vidya Radhakrishnan, Peter Jerome
